tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.name: items
tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.description: Required. Array of checkbox items objects. See items below.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Specific id attribute for the checkbox item. If omitted, then component global idPrefix option will be applied.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentHTML is set, this is not required. Text to use within each checkbox item label. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each checkbox item label. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: checked
arrayOptions.description: If true, checkbox will be checked.

arrayOptions.name: titleText
arrayOptions.description: Text to use as a heading for the checkbox option. (Displays as h3)

arrayOptions.name: disabled
arrayOptions.description: If true, checkbox will be disabled.

tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.name: hint
tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.description: Options for the hint component (e.g. text). See hint options below.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Optional id attribute to add to the hint span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentHTML is set, this is not required. Text to use within the hint. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the hint. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the hint span tag.

tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.name: idPrefix
tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.description: String to prefix id for each checkbox item if no id is specified on each item. If not passed, fall back to using the name option instead.

tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.name: name
tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.description: Required. Name attribute for all checkbox items.

tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.name: classes
tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.description: Classes to add to the checkboxes container.

tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.name: error
tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.description: If true, errorMessage will show. Defaults to false.

tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.name: errorMessage
tfwmdsCheckboxesProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage options below.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the error message span tag.
